mapper.select: SELECT A.NUM, A.NAME, A.PRICE, A.ROASTERYNAME, A.SALE, B.FILENAME FROM PRODUCT A JOIN PRODUCTFILE B ON A.NUM = B.PRODUCTNUM WHERE A.NUM = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (NUM, CONTENTS, REGDATE, RATING, WRITER, MEMBERID, PRODUCTNUM) VALUES (REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{contents}, SYSDATE, #{rating}, #{writer}, #{memberId}, #{productNum})
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET CONTENTS = #{contents}, RATING = #{rating} WHERE NUM = #{num}
